Token.Abstract: This protocol defines an interface for delegates of a FirmwareManager object to be notified of the result of a firmware update check and the result of a firmware update application.
Notifies the delegate if a firmware update is or isn't available for the connected accessory.

Parameter.Name: isUpdateAvailable
Parameter.Abstract: True if a firmware version more recent that the current version was found and downloaded succesfully. False otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate if the firmware update for the connected accessory was performed succesfuly.

Parameter.Name: wasUpdateSuccessful
Parameter.Abstract: True if a firmware update was successfully applied. False otherwise.
